author: Justine Coleman
title: Malaysian government warned women not to be 'sarcastic' to husbands during coronavirus lockdown
description: The Malaysian government warned women not to be "sarcastic" to their husbands when asking them to help with household chores during coronavirus lockdowns, a request that sparked debate Tuesday.Ma...
content:
The Malaysian government warned women not to be sarcastic to their husbands when asking them to help with household chores during coronavirus lockdowns, a request that sparked debate Tuesday.
